original: 河內獲嘉人，曹魏官員。有識見，善鑑人，好舉賢。與曹植友善，因曾誇讚曹植，而被曹丕記恨。曹丕登基後，竟以街市不夠繁華為由問罪，最終逼迫楊俊自殺。
text: Hanoi was awarded the prize, Cao Wei official. Knowledgeable, good at appraising people, and good at hiring talents. Friendship with Cao Zhi, because he once praised Cao Zhi, he was hated by Cao Pi. After Cao Pi ascended the throne, he actually asked Yang Jun to commit suicide because the market was not prosperous enough.
